tool.name: OGS: OGS2VTK
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'OGS2VTK'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_input_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; OGS2VTK --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' $ascii_output --mesh-output-file output_1.vtk

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.msh). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: Write VTU output in ASCII file. Due to possible rounding the ascii output could result in lower accuracy

tool.help: This tool runs the **OGS2VTK** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
